PageTitle: authentication event authen-server-down action close re-authen
FuncDef:
The authentication event authen-server-down action close re-authen command disables re-authentication when the authentication server is Down.
The undo authentication event authen-server-down action close re-authen command restores the default setting. The authentication event authen-server-down action close re-authen command disables re-authentication when the authentication server is Down. The undo authentication event authen-server-down action close re-authen command restores the default setting. By default, the device does not re-authenticate users when the authentication server turns Up from Down. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
CLIs: authentication event authen-server-down action close re-authen
undo authentication event authen-server-down action close re-authen
Examples: [*HUAWEI-authen-profile-authen1] authentication event authen-server-down action close re-authen
